user_data.target_needs: I wanted to fulfill the need for comfort and support in my undergarments, seeking a product that would feel good throughout the day without the discomfort of traditional wired bras.
purchase_reason: I was looking for a comfortable and seamless bra that would provide support without the discomfort of wires. The soft fabric and the side-smoothing panels were particularly appealing, and despite ordering the wrong size, I found the overall feel and quality to be excellent.

I wanted a wireless bra that offered both comfort and support. The fabric's softness and the fit were important to me, and even though I had concerns about sizing, the overall comfort and feel of the product made me happy with my choice.

I needed a bra that was extremely comfortable and fit well. The smooth fabric and the way it conformed to my body were key factors in my decision, and I felt confident recommending it to others after trying it.

I was in search of a bra that provided exceptional comfort and support. The features like the stretchy wireless cups and moisture-wicking fabric were significant in my decision, and I was pleased with how it felt when worn.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer products that offer comfort, good fit, and quality materials. I value items that are soft to the touch, provide adequate support, and are easy to wear for extended periods. I appreciate when clothing fits well and allows for movement, as well as when accessories are functional and durable. Additionally, I enjoy products that are well-priced and deliver good value for money. On the other hand, I tend to dislike items that are uncomfortable, poorly fitting, or made from low-quality materials. I have a strong aversion to products that do not meet my expectations for comfort and fit, especially in clothing and undergarments.

conversation.content: I want to find a comfortable and supportive undergarment that doesn't have wires and can be worn all day without discomfort. within my expected price range: [12.99, 18.99]
What specific size or sizing requirements do you have for the undergarment you are looking for?

I prefer undergarments that fit well and offer adequate support without wires. Comfort is essential for me, so I look for items that are soft to the touch and can be worn throughout the day without any discomfort. In terms of sizing, I usually go for my standard size, but I'm open to suggestions if there are specific recommendations based on the product.
"What type of closure do you prefer for your undergarments, such as hooks, snaps, or pull-on styles?"

I generally prefer undergarments with pull-on styles for closure. I find them easier to wear and more comfortable throughout the day. Comfort is a top priority for me, so I value closures that don't cause any irritation or discomfort.

Here are some items that you might like: 
Item No.1 : Item Title: <Hanes Women's SmoothTec ComfortFlex Fit Wirefree Bra MHG199> / Item ID: B01HRFT6YQ / Price: $12.99 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["Welcome to a wireless world where you never have to sacrifice comfort for support. Hanes® Smooth Comfort® wireless bra is brilliantly constructed for both. Carefully shaped foam cups and Hanes®' stay-in-place SmoothTec® band provide all the support you need, with the brand's ComfortFlex Fit® fabric that molds to your shape, not the other way around. One of the best features of this wirefree convertible bra is the Cool Comfort® fabric that wicks away moisture to keep you cool and dry all day. This seamless, wireless bra provides full coverage with a flattering sweetheart neckline. You'll also appreciate the smooth cups and seamless construction that make this an ideal T-shirt bra. One more handy design detail is the convertible straps that offer two ways to wear for fashion flexibility."] 
Item No.2 : Item Title: <JUST MY SIZE Women's Pure Comfort Front Close Wirefree Bra MJ1274> / Item ID: B07S3LQ9NQ / Price: $17.0 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["If you thought it was impossible to find the support you need with the comfort you deserve, think again. JMS® presents their Pure Comfort® wireless, full-coverage bra that has everything you want in a bra. It starts with the remarkably comfortable yet effective light support, achieved with smartly engineered strategic support zones and a wider, no-roll knit underband for subtle under bust shaping. You'll love the convenience and ease of the front-close styling, with plush cushioning under the hook-and-eye panel for no-dig comfort. The seamless design gives you the sleek, smooth look you want under T-shirts and other clingy clothes. Wider straps and a built-up back help smooth away bulges even more. Plus, this wire-free tee shirt bra is made with moisture-wicking fabric that helps to keep you cool and dry all day. Made with 4-way stretch that moves effortlessly with you, there's a lot to love in this front-close wirefree bra from JMS."] 
Item No.3 : Item Title: <Bali Women's Comfort Revolution Seamless Brief> / Item ID: B075J3T6MD / Price: $7.06 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ['A no-ride-up design, Bali® women’s Comfort Revolution® brief is made for the woman on-the-go. Designed with Cool Comfort® moisture-wicking nylon fabric, this women’s panty will keep you comfortable all-day long. The high-rise, seamless panty features a tag-free design that won’t chafe or dig. Narrow leg bands and a knit-in waistband help minimize panty lines for a smooth finish. A classic brief cut, Bali® seamless women’s underwear offers full front and back coverage so you can move with confidence.']
